title.narrative: OUTP 5.4: EIE PREP. AND RESPONSE

description.narrative: UNICEF-targeted children aged 3-12 in humanitarian situations having access to formal or non-formal education, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: By 2020, all boys and girls, including young people, have increased and more equitable access to, and completion of, quality, inclusive education, with improved learning outcomes.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF PRIMARY AND SECONDARY EDUCATION

sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education
